strapiPost.title: Don't Miss The Tontitown Grape Festival This Week
strapiPost.content:
Back for its 123rd year, the Tontitown Grape Festival kicks off tomorrow night. 

  • Something for everybody: The festival’s schedule includes free nightly entertainment, adrenaline-inducing carnival rides, a craft fair, and the always-delicious Italian spaghetti dinner. 
  • Pick up your feet: If grape stomping and dancing aren’t enough to get you on your feet, there’s still one day left to sign up for the Run for the Grapes 5K on Saturday morning. 

See the full festival schedule HERE.
